name: webscrapersubsrust
description: ### Setting up a web driver - download the latest verison of the [gecko driver](https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases) ``` wget https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.33.0/geckodriver-v0.33.0-linux64.tar.gz ``` - extract the file ``` tar -xvzf geckodriver* ``` - make it executable ``` chmod +x geckodriver ``` - move it to make it globally executable ``` sudo mv geckodriver /usr/local/bin/ ```
